front.title: JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) Web Key (JWK) for Public Key Infrastructure (X.509) (PKIX) Certificates

abstract.t: This document defines a JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) Web Key (JWK) object to wrap Public Key Infrastructure (X.509) (PKIX) certificate chains, to allow for some interoperability between existing PKIX-based systems and newer JOSE-based systems.
